lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [Geralt voice] I feel like I should be doing it like this for the rest of the night.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, you should!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dungeon mastering down here for the remainder. It's a good plan. Let's see. Taliesin, you had an announcement?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I did. Hi, sorry. For those of you on Twitter, you now know what I was just doing. Yes, I'm going to be at Oni Con. I'm flying to Oni Con in Galveston, Texas at 6:30 tomorrow morning. Yay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It'll be great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, good announcement. I like it, it's a good announcement. Let's see, next up: Liam, you wanted to mention something?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And if anyone heads over to wyrmwoodgaming.com and uses the coupon code CritRole, then you will get a discount on any purchases you make there from here into perpetuity-- that's not true at all. As long as we're having a good time with Wyrmwood. So thank you, Wyrmwood, for the boxes, and everybody please go check them out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What was the code again?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: CritRole. I want to lick mine and make love to it all night long.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I recommend waiting until after the stream.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Which one did you get, Liam?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is the darkest ebony they have.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They have all kinds of wood. It's really freaking cool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is the rosewood?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I got the unicorn walnut wood.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you did. You're a unicorn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm getting crumbs in my bosom?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, you are, actually.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's all good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like cookies in bed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I do know Sam got Purpleheart. Since he's not here, we can show it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's here. He's just getting ready.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Purpleheart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks fantastic.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Chicken heart.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Chicken heart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh man. That costume, Travis. I think I mentioned it before-- I'm pretty sure in one of my games we've had a time. (laughs)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I get advantage all night?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we all get to see what we're dressed as?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, trade me seats for a second, Liam.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Get out of here, Dread.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll take this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. So ladies?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is Rat Queens.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're Rat Queens. I'm Violet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm Hannah. You should check it out. It's an awesome comic book.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You should.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've got to swear.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Huh? Oh, I'm conjuring up a little fuck you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Something like that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's pretty great.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Rat Queens. It's great. Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Travis, what are you dressed as?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm Helga the angry tavern wench, and I only love one man: Scanlan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) That's fantastic. Other side of the table, let's see.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, look who just showed up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who are you dressed as, Sam?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's Smokey and the Bandit. I can't get him to stay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's okay, we'll find some duct tape for you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My costume is awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Awesome, it is awesome. Yeah, your monkey's been a little rough.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, I'm so sweaty.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Our mustaches need to take a picture with each other.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh that is some 'stache love.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, that's amazing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dirty, dirty 'stache love.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Taliesin.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am Quentin Quire, Kid Omega of the X-Men, for those of you who read way too much X-Men, so this is my throw-together, because he has a mohawk and so few people do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But we skipped over my brother.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, indeed, because he vanished.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm the Dread Pirate Roberts, and I will most likely kill you in the morning-- or myself, because this is actually very sharp

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you have a comment about my perfect breasts and the shortage of them? Oh no! Careful, they are expensive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Put that right there. Be careful, or there's actually stabbing in real life as opposed to just the game today. That'll be fun.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Liam doesn't know how to use knives or swords at all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm dressed as Geralt of Rivia from the Witcher Series. Witcher 3, specifically, for this set of armor and outfit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How about that costume, ladies and gentlemen?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He made all of that, by the way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's a full-size action figure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He made that?

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are you talking about?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But yeah, that's our crazy Halloween-ness. We'll kick back here in just a minute to start the game and see what the wonders and dangers of Whitestone bring to Vox Machina. See you in just a second.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: [dramatic music]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Murdered most of them. They took his toady, essentially, Vouk, and instead of murdering him, tore out his tongue and then burned the de Rolo family crest into his forehead--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You say they. Not quite how I remember it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The way you're putting that is a lot worse than actually--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, but it's fun to push it that way.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel this is a little one-sided.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But yeah, with his tongue removed and the symbol burned into his forehead, he was thrown out the window, and the party then escaped into the night rain, returning to their tavern, and that was where we left off. So. As you guys come in from the soaking-wet rain that seemed to have been now pouring continuously through the city of Whitestone, you come to the quiet of your tavern, the sun beginning to find its way, setting across the evening sky. What would you like to do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm having a real hard time roleplaying right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know what you mean. What are you doing Vax? Come on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's actually really difficult to play a character when you're dressed as a different character, not going to lie.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, we're going to learn!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're going to learn how to do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't do that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know, I feel as groggy as ever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't think Scanlan's going to have a problem tonight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope, this is how I imagine myself to be.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am not going to look at that table at all tonight. All auditory for you three. Sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we are-- wait, I forget.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys just now returned to the tavern.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're in the tavern. It's nighttime now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's starting to push later into the evening, now you guys have returned to the tavern.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And as we returned to the tavern, did we see hustle and bustle of people rising up in rebellion, by any chance?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not yet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Overnight rebellion!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's been fairly fresh since you even started the word of it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We were very discreet and discreetly putting the Dust of Tracelessness on the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus there was a large distraction with Sir Kerrion's homestead being lit on fire. The rain taking care of most of it, but it drew people out of their homes to see this giant blazing symbol of the de Rolo family burning across the rooftop. So a message was definitely left and probably received by somebody, and what are your plans?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One down, how many left? How many are there left?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Four? Four.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Four.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There are five total? Whoa, I did math.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There are six barrels. One is empty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you think the other two are-- the barrel names: so two are Sylas and Delilah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And we know that one of the other two barrel names resides in that place that we found. The countess, what was her name? The doctor?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Doctor Ripley.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And what's the fourth name?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Professor Anders.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we really going to talk about names right now and not about the giant creepy smoke monster that came out of you, Percy?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not here, not where we've been. Somewhere else. I think we need to scope out another place.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think it's safe to leave tonight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The streets are going to be crawling with guards and people looking for us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we back in our hole where we were?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're back in the tavern where you guys were.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It might be smart to be down in the cellar tonight, not up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I agree.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there any sort of way you can close us in and make it look like it's a single-story dwelling?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, we'll go down to the tree and we'll make it look like no one's ever tunneled down there before.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I mean we can literally camp next to the roots of the tree if we want to. I made it look nice in there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can clear out a bit more space.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Burt, your mustache is falling off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It is?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (giggles) You know the situation is very dire, I don't know why I'm laughing, it's a nervous habit. I'm sorry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Speaking of nervous habits.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One of us has a nervous habit of ejecting smoke from his rib cage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's going on? Oh, and we've tunneled, right? We're below the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys have made your way to the inn, if you all wanted to go down and to the tree--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's go down into the cellar. I'm going to go ahead and throw up some walls.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Walls, or the false ground?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can do the false terrain--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, do that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll do Hallucinatory Terrain, and I will make it look like she said. One story, no cellar.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So the opening to the cellar will be just a dirt floor.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just wooden floor, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No one's here, looks like it hasn't been touched.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Those eyes make you look far more sarcastic than you normally do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do they?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (shouting) Argh, god! (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And he doesn't even smile at all.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jeez, you're the worst.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So Percival, spill your guts. What the fuck is going on?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't entirely know. Where to begin?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You didn't look surprised when that happened.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, in fact, you pulled down your mask, which you don't normally do in battles.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It felt-- it didn't feel like a surprise. I don't know. It didn't feel good. I was hoping it would.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You didn't seem to mind it as it was happening.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think I wanted him to recognize me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Kerrion. I don't know. I was hoping it would feel better.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Could you feel it happening while it was? Were you conscious? Do you remember what you did?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What the fuck is it? What is it, Percival? What is it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A few years ago, I had a dream. I had a very intense dream, and in this dream, something asked me if I wanted revenge. If I wanted the means to have revenge. And all I would have to do in return is offer up the souls of those I took.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (flatly) Oh, that's all.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was a dream! It was just a dream.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And yet you've fashioned your entire life's goal upon this dream.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I woke up in the morning with an idea, and I built that idea. I thought it was prophetic, and lately I've been feeling a bit of strain, and recalling it, but it was just a dream!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So the day after this dream was when you first developed your Pepperbox?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not the first time I felt inspired in my life. I just-- it wasn't real.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And Percy, how long after the coup and after you lost your family was this dream?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sighs) Maybe a year. I was fuzzy at first; I wasn't really me anymore. I was a fisherman for a while. I didn't do anything. This was something to do with myself; this was something to work towards.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, we're clearly not talking about a dream anymore. We all saw it. Do you have any theories?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't. I don't know. I've never thought about it. It didn't matter.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It matters now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know what to do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who is the last bullet for?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sighs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't want to lose you, Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: When I started this, I talked to a man, at one point. He was the captain of one of the vessels I was on. I told him what I intended to do, and I showed him what I was building. And he said that if I really wanted revenge, if revenge was what I was after, that there would be no stopping it. And there would be casualties along the way, and I would have to give up things, and I would have to hurt people. And that was the price, so that last barrel is because it's not just five names; I know I'm going to have to keep hurting people and that this thing existing is just going to keep hurting people. It's the knowledge that it never ends. It's because I haven't just killed five people. I've killed a lot of people on my way here. I've killed them with you. And it's to remind me that this is what I've chosen.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't understand. We've killed with reason.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I have tried to. And I certainly have reason for these five names. They are not good people. These are not people who should be allowed to live.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: None of us debate that the Briarwoods and their circle should be allowed to go on. We all understand what they're capable of. We all understand that they need to be removed. But what we just saw goes beyond, and you're telling us that this is going to continue after the Briarwoods and their like are gone. What are we to look forward to, Percival? Where are we going?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was hoping that once I'd finished serving revenge that perhaps I could serve repentance.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're speaking of these as if they're metaphysical beings. You're serving revenge. That sounds very literal, and from what I've seen, isn't inaccurate.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I no longer feel in control. I no longer trust myself. I wouldn't expect you to trust me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Stretching a little thin right now, Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But I trust you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I just do a quick insight to see if he's being entirely honest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, that didn't work. Much better. 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18. Go ahead and roll a dice, Percival.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Dice plus what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, I'll roll it for you. What's your bonus?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For which?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For both persuasion and deception.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Persuasion and deception? Persuasion, six. Deception, two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Confused, but driven, and there isn't any part of his voice that seems to conceal or attempt to hold back any information.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you afraid you're going to hurt us?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No. I'm afraid I'm going to disappoint you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How would you disappoint us?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I think I need people here who are not here for revenge. I don't know how to stop this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just because you started on this path for revenge doesn't mean you can't find other motivations along the way. Do you believe you're not doing this with your friends or for your friends? Not even a little bit; it's only a hundred percent revenge?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want them to feel remorse for what they have done. I want them to pay, and if this thing is real, if this is really what is happening now, I hope that wherever they go, they suffer forever and beyond.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think that sounds fair.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am so grateful there is justice in this. But even if there wasn't, I would still be here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want to talk about a plan, because our desires are in lockstep up to a point. Once we have gotten rid of the last of them, I want to know what happens then, Percival.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think if we get out of this, either I'm going to need you to save me or finish me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we won't do that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If it comes to it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Damn it, where is Pike?! She would know about this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She would.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I miss Pike.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I do want to save this city.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we do any kind of religion check to see if we know anything about this kind of entity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, go ahead and make a religion check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Suiting.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) Suiting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, there are all sorts of extraplanar entities throughout the realms that have their own individual descriptions.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Whenever he starts a description with "I mean," it's not good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do know that many of these bargains in the long run do not end up being wholly in the person's favor who struck it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, look. It's going to help him on his quest, get revenge and kill all the people that killed his family, right? So can we do that, and then if it gets out of control, we bop him on the head and take him to a temple?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think that's the best plan we have, actually.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, you were really awesome in that last fight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You did look pretty amazing, I'm not going to lie.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A little bit of pee came out. It was that good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It went really dark.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And here's the thing. There's a thing. There it is, right there. Here's the thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh god, I hadn't even noticed. So sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Your chances of succeeding here alone are pretty fucking slim. And if you want us all to work with you, you can't go from door to door, bringing wrath and ruin the way you just did, or you won't have our assistance. Not all of us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't you turn your eyes away from me. Look at me when I'm talking to you. We all knew what we were doing when we went into the house. It was an assassination mission. I don't understand why everyone's harping on how dark it got. We knew we were there to kill everyone in the whole place.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is a city oppressed. These people did not invite it upon themselves.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That guy deserved it, but we did rip his tongue out, which I think was a bit harsh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He said take his tongue.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: These people don't want to exchange one warlord for another. We need to maybe dial it back a tick or two.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I disagree.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do, too, Pedostache.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have to make a strong appearance. This is shock and awe. We're not going to win over the people by half measures and hey, let's hold an election, or something. We have to kill everyone in as dramatic a fashion as possible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is beheading a pony all over again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You think we're going to win them over by showing them how disgusting we are?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, how disgusting they are, and how disgusting they die.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. I mean the civilians here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're not going to kill civilians!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Of course, but we're trying to win them over, and if we're showing that we're ripping out their tongues and pulling their ears off and flaying their balls, they're going to be just as scared of us as they are of the Briarwoods.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They'll probably be pretty happy that the people that have been hurting them are being punished.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, they've been oppressed, but we've also seen there's plenty of cases of people being charmed by them. We might have an army of people who will die for the Briarwoods at any cost and not even realizing they're being charmed that way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I wouldn't mind a few people being scared of us, too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will say it did get out of hand. And if I had known then what I know now, I would hope that you would restrain me in those moments where I seem to be going further than I should.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Done.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you saying for your final bullet, you want us to stop you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, he's saying that if he goes dark, if he goes against his person that we know--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Knock me out and take me to a temple.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't want to scratch the name off the barrel?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I didn't know it was going to disappear, to be fair. I thought that maybe I could stop what was happening to me. I panicked.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy, do you realize we tried to talk to you for a good 15 minutes after all that last night, and you were unreachable? Do you remember that? So us saying if you start getting out of control, and you think that we're going to be able to be like, yo Percy, calm it down a bit--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're not going to do that. We're going to knock him the fuck out!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't worry, Percy. We've got you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think I would knock him out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll knock you out if you really want me to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Please,

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I walk up and I kiss him on the cheek. and I say: Don't you worry, we've got you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Especially with the cough, thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't believe you're really sick, darling.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Vex, I've heard a cough like that, and it's probably syphilis.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lovely. Thank you, Scanlan.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I barely sl-- I don't, I--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Personal experience, that's all I'm saying.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shall we rest and then we go find another house?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, maybe we should, now that we have the knock-Percy-out-in-case-of-emergency plan, should we have a revolution plan? Because we seem to be divided on that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's still two more lords in the city. And there is the castle. They know we're here now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It might behoove us to spend a day or two finding another shelter, and also seeing what our actions have resulted in, and seeing if we can't sway some opinion in our favor, because we're strong, but we're also pretty weak these days, and I wouldn't want to go against the big guns yet until we have the people behind us. Or at least possibly turn one of those giants to our side or something. We need some help.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have a map of the city, yes? I think it best to stay off the streets. Is it possible, Keyleth, to tunnel through the city, underneath it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good idea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can, actually. Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can't really talk to people that way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, but they know we're here. It's not safe. We can come up in secret, leave symbols to rally the people, and hide again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You want to get a beat on the vibe of what people are saying out there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, hep cat, yes. I'm wanting to get a beat on the vibe. Yes, I think we need to hear what people are saying. In the privacy of their homes, maybe. Do some snooping.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, there's a few people in our party who are good at that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And we need to find another potential safehouse.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, that's plan number one, then. I think it's not a bad idea that we spread this de Rolo family crest around.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Have we been to the Alcove yet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You went to the Alcove-- no, you have not been to the Alcove.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We haven't been to the Alcove or the barracks yet. The barracks are right against the castle, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. You went to the Lady's Chamber and you spoke briefly with Keeper Yennen.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, with Keeper Yennen.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, let's go to the barracks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you went to Beyond the Horizon, which was abandoned and partially collapsed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The barracks will be our last stop, I believe. Just because it's outside the city proper and it's up the hill. We might be able to stay at the Alcove, which is a magic shop that used to be in town. I know the proprietor, or I did, if he's still alive.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, let's go there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Magic shop? Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was a magic shop, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's an arcane boutique, yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: An arcane boutique.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we tunneling there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we going there now? Are we resting?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should rest.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's nighttime!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now, I would say, based on preparation, the illusion-casting, conversation, you're looking at about 9:00, 9:30 in the evening.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We could get an early start once the light hits.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If you fall asleep, is that illusion going to vanish?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I think Hallucinatory Terrain lasts for--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I sense anything near us? Can I sense vampires above us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're looking for undead?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Undead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You feel a surrounding presence scattered throughout the city, some large, some small. You can gather over a period of time of concentration, you can feel the slow movement of the zombie giants moving through the city, the sentinels slowly tromping through, and a number of other undead entities there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it feel like there's more in motion than there were before we set off the blaze?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would say yes, there appears to be a little more haste and movement to what entities you can-- and you can't pinpoint specifics, but you do sense that there is a heightened state of movement, to what you've previously sensed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes I've a thought that at night, obviously, these streets are full of dead things. Tomorrow, the Briarwoods and the people that work for them are going to start pulling people out of their houses and telling them to look for us or anyone who's not from this city, so I don't think that the beggar routine is going to work for much longer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's why we stay under the city. That's what I said.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Of course, but if you want to talk to people, I think we could probably get away with poking about first thing in the morning and that's it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So we should probably get up early.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And in addition to your excellent illusion spell--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Which lasts for 24 hours.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's wonderful to hear. Is there any other means of protection we have? I mean, if they are magic wielders, they might be able to sense our presence or something. Is there any way to obscure that? I guess I'm asking this, but I'm one of the only two magic wielders here, so I should know the answer.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was going to say, it would be probably a me and you thing. In terms of making us not as noticeable, Seeming is probably going to be our closest thing. I don't have anything--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's just a visual, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nothing like a bubble of protection or anything?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've got my Antilife Shell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But they're undead. Lovely. Well, first watch. Who's taking it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can all get a good night's sleep, I think, if I tunnel us in and we've got Hallucinatory Terrain.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I still think we should keep watch.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Percy's got it, yeah. I'll take second.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're all down at the bottom of the tunnel by the roots of the Sun Tree? And you have Hallucinatory Terrained the cellar?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I hate that he's asking for clarification.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't 'what?' me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the DC of your spell?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Of Hallucinatory Terrain?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Of all your spellcasting, what's the DC?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's 17. No, 18. But I know they have to make an intelligence save to see through Hallucinatory Terrain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. If something were interested in doing so.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Exactly, hypothetically.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So who's taking first watch?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Percy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will watch with him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, Percy can't watch alone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, that's fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll watch with him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, I raised my hand before, but that's all right. I'll get some sleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It's tight quarters. And you know, other than either a magical light or torch someone wants to put up, there is no light source. It is pitch black down here. What are you guys using as a light source, or are you leaving it pitch dark?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, you can light your little flaming warhammer.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And it turns on fire.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm pretty sure he just said bagel.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bagel?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. So, you guys take first watch, rest is till about 11PM or midnight or so. You guys finish. Who's taking second watch? All right, we've got Grog and Vax. All right so, you guys--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: While Percival is sleeping, I pull Grog over and we look at him for a while, and I say, where do you think the smoke comes out of?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, that's a good question.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you think it's the nostrils?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, it looked like it was coming from the bottom up, and there's only two holes down there, so it's either--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Either the dirt button--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It could just be his pores. You're right, it's probably--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's probably the periscope. You're right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are having this conversation, the air down here, it's damp earth. It's chilled in the night, anyway, but it's a little warmer because you're under the ground, and it's absorbed some of the heat of the day. But it is getting noticeably colder.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's getting colder?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, just as the evening progresses. The temperature at night here--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Colder than it did last night? Because it also got pretty cold last night.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Comparable, yeah. There's a low mist begins to form within the tunnel from the temperature.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I wake up my sister.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What, what do you want?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's fog or something. What's going on?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's just cold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we see if it's magic?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do that thing again. You can tell when stuff's around.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh good, I rolled a one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I do a nature check to show them it's just fucking fog?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, go ahead and roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You step forward and take a good long look at the fog that is slowly beginning to form at the base of the tunnel you guys are in. As you lean forward and take it in, the fog begins to form into a physical humanoid essence and reach out for you. For the three that are conscious, roll initiative.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit. It's a teeny tiny tunnel.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's another damn ghost wraith thing ghosting in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So what if the Sun Tree is like--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The source of the bad?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's possible it is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if the Briarwoods are right under the Sun Tree, and we're right above them?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What if they didn't hang the bodies, the tree just grabbed people?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Grog back in the fog, Vex is waking up the back, Trinket asleep next to her. Percy, Scanlan.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, can you move the Wyrmwood box, because all I'm--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Beautiful boxes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Indeed, all right. This will go there for now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You look really good, Matt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Get some initiatives on this. For Grog?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17, all righty. Okay, Laura?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22, all right, and?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18. Good to know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we spooning?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're sporking.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, we are?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You guys might be sporking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Vex, Grog, then you rolled a what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, sorry, Vax. Vex, you rolled a--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22, right, Grog you were a--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17, okay. So Grog, this is technically a surprise round on you, then we'll get back to you guys on top of the initiative. You can see now, the mist has formed into a pale humanoid, with two more now that have rolled in. These pale-looking, intensely feral human beings with elongated fangs emerge from this mist and immediately lunge out towards you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are they vampires?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can they do that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They can. They're fucking vampires.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, they can only become bats. I read about this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (sings) Let's do this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is going to make a claw attack against you. That is a 20 to hit?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not attempt, it grapples you. So it reaches out and grasps on to some of the hide armor you have tied around your shoulder, pulls you in, and is going to attempt to sink its teeth into your actual body.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't forget that we all have our amazing metal around our neck that Scanlan got us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're so intimidating in that costume.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good. That is a 17 versus armor class.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That misses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so it attempts to bite into you, you move out of the way just in time, and that little bit of chain mail, that practically useless piece of chainmail wrapped around your giant thick neck does manage to catch its fangs and deflect the attack initially.

lines.name: LIAM, LAURA
lines.text: Hey!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What, that piece of metal thing? Hey, I made that. I call it a Scanlan. I call everything a Scanlan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Since it's a surprise round, natural 20. All right, so you take five points of piercing damage, and--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And you're a vampire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And 11 points of necrotic, and your maximum hit points are reduced by 11.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, really?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, we haven't had another feast yet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, and the feast is gone too, isn't it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So this third one over here is going to attempt to come after you, Vax, closest to it. That is a 24 to hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, that hits, but I'm going to use Uncanny Dodge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, to reduce the damage?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, by half.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's 2d4 slashing against you. Ten points of slashing damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is the half?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a 12.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This, however, sets you up for the easily dodged second blow. You swoop out of the way just barely in time, feeling the wind (whoosh) above your head. That ends their turn. Now we're at the top of the initiative order: surprise round. This would not have been enough noise to wake you guys yet, so you're going to hold on until somebody can get your attention. Top of the round will be Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to say: Wake the fuck up! And I am going to-- can I hide? Is that what I do as my bonus?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have nowhere to hide in this room, unfortunately.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Even if it's super-duper dark?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get the idea that these creatures probably aren't largely affected by the dark.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That makes perfect sense. I'm going to Hunter's Mark the one that looks the strongest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You mark that one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I am now going to attack him with my blazing bow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. Natural 20!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice! Wyrmwood Box.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Breaking in the new box.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (sings) It's my dice in a box.

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Dice in a box, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I add all of my dice together and then I double it, and then I add the modifier? Okay. And I Hunter's Marked him, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 31 definitely hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's 31 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, 31 damage. (laughs) Okay. All righty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The second one was a three. It was a 14 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Its reflexes are very quick.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Be honest, the karma will come back to you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, so as you pull back, you release, and with a flash of burning energy, your arrow ignites mid-transit. It blasts and bursts into the vampiric creature, who hisses at you (snarls) through the dark. The second arrow, however, it's completely ready for and actually manages to swipe it out of the air with its clawed hand. Okay, that ends your turn. Next up is Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, there is one vampire right in front of me, right? The one who hurt me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But I'm looking past his head at the one next to Grog, the one that's got a blade down there on the map. No, the other one. Yeah, I think I've got a pretty good shot at him. I'm going to ignore the vampire in front of me and since Grog is right up against that guy, I'm going to sneak attack him and go (daggers flying) Oh no, first I'm going to go click with my heels, and then I'm going to (daggers flying).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Click, click. Dagger, dagger, dagger.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dagger, dagger, dagger! What you got?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's all right. It's a 19. The second is a 28. And the third is a 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All three hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, the first one was?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't remember.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18. Yeah. They all hit; not a problem.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so the first one is the sneak attack, and that one gets-- oh, I should be using the Wyrmwood box. Eight plus 12, 15, 18, 25. 25 for the first one. And for the second dagger that sinks into his head, that is eight. And for the third one that sinks into his fanged fucking face, that is nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The eyes help on this, huh? A nice and sizable chunk of damage. All righty, that ends your turn, unless you want to try to move?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, actually I'm going to-- no. nope. I'm good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Please do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I would like to take my Firebrand Warhammer and pound that shit to the left of me twice in the head with my fiery hammer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, yeah. That is a 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 just barely hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And that's a one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's so hard to roleplay tonight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's so difficult.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm Jimmy Falloning so hard over here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you are. (chuckles)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This time, you go to swing with all your might on your second blow, trying to smash it up against the earth that you guys have carved this tunnel out of. It ducks out of the way in split-second timing, and your hammer gets wedged into the side of the wall. Go ahead and make an athletics check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pull that shit out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit. Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine. It's pretty well wedged in there right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Next weapon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was 18?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Misses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Misses. You slap aside with your hand as you still try to pull the warhammer out of the wall, and then it gets clotheslined by the grip you have on it. It's going to try to strike you with its claws for the second attack. That's a ten. Yeah, no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Misses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You (swish) out of its way, laughing in its face. The one against you, Percy, where you're on the ground prone. Oh okay, that'll be an 18?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm an 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It grabs you by the front of your shit and lifts you up with that hissing sound. Yeah, that'll be a 25. It pulls you in and sinks its fangs into the side of your throat. You can feel yourself gasp out in pain as the cold sensation pulses through your body, the actual life's blood being drained from you. Okay, you take four points of piercing damage, and you take eight points of necrotic damage, and your maximum hit points are reduced by eight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I forgot I have advantage on strength checks when I'm raging.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow, really?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's as if the gods defy you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, and the one that's Hunter's Marked, that's against you. It's going to attempt to grab you. That's a 20?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, that works.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, no damage. It's just going to grab you. And it goes in to attempt to go through your throat. You being prepared for this, having been subjected to this once before, you bring a dagger up towards its face and it just barely manages to pull out of the way before you thrust it up through the bottom of its neck. You manage to deflect the attack. All right, the people who just woke up, roll initiative, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Initiative?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which, for the record Scanlan, as a fan mentioned to me this last week, your jack-of-all-trades ability as a bard that gives you plus two to all things you're not proficient in also adds to your initiative, technically. So you have a plus two to your initiative. I've had this brought up multiple times, if it's not true.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know it's been brought up to me. I thought it was a hypothetical. Is it true?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's been clarified by a couple of publications that have been sent to me when I questioned it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What is the bonus for that hat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll consider that hat the plus two bonus.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (chuckles) So I get a plus two. I rolled a 20 initiative, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh snap. Scanlan next to Vax. Nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12. All right, Percy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have really good initiative.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so we are now at the top of the round. This puts us to Vex and Percy going simultaneously.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll go first. I'm going to try and break grapple, obviously, since that's what I have to do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I aid him by shooting him at the same time as he is trying to break the grapple?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know what? Yes, go ahead and roll your first attack.

lines.name: LIAM

lines.text: I'm going to stay right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Trinket is cheering you on (bear noises) from the back wall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thanks, Trinket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it true that we can't kill it except with sunlight?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sunlight and water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not entirely certain. You know that sunlight is very damaging to it, and from your research, you know that vampires of certain levels of power, as opposed to dying, turn into a mist form and attempt to retreat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They misted in.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to hack at his neck with my sword a couple of times.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I wrote all that stuff down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 28 hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, all three hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ten points, 15 points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ten points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten points, got it. All right, so you slam the rapier three times into its body, leaving these large gaping wounds. It's looking like it's hurt, and its eyes are darting about, gauging its chances. That'll be your turn, unless you wish to move.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll back away from it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you're back there. As you back away, it sees the opportunity and reaches out with its claws towards you. That is a nine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That does not hit. I'm going to really quickly also do a second wind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we ask it questions or something?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does it talk?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we should probably just kill it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm up? I'm not ready. I guess I don't need to see it. Can I see it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's right here. You're right there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Can I do this? I will just taunt it. I will use Vicious Mockery on it, and I'll just say: What's up? What's up, toothy? Hey, bite me. That's it. That's all I do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckles) Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's 3d4.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it is. That was about 3d4 worth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's all I got. I wasn't ready.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's up, toothy? Bite me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think it's a wisdom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There we go. Yeah, it's a wisdom saving throw. No, it does not make it with a six.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But his singing skill makes it very bassy and full.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, you cast Vicious Mockery at 3rd level?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because I'm a level 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's 3d4 damage. It does take it and it has disadvantage on its next attack roll.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I do it at an even higher level?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, I was thinking of another spell. Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Four, two, two. Eight!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this? (cheering)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bite me hard. Bite me, motherfucker, bite me!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Urine flying everywhere.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh shit, I forgot. Oh, there's urine everywhere. My mustache is falling off; it's terrible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as it's trying to take its chances, it turns to go ahead and flee. Sees Grog, looks over and hears you going: "Hey, toothy!" Looks over back at you. One of the weaknesses of a vampire is running water. Technically, it needs to be a large amount of running water, but this creature is on death's door and based on the fact that it is right on the edge of passing out, anyway, the bit of your--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Constellation Urine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, streaks across the front of the vampire as it turns around. Grog just instinctually slams it with the hammer and smashes it into the ground. It's hard to say which killed it, but you're pretty sure it was you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good job, Scanlan!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: High five! (impact sound)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Chest bump! (impact sound)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which, for the record, as you high five him, there is a bit of spatter across your hand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Future reference, the fog is bad. Not totally natural.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, there is no gnome like our gnome. Oh my gods.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seriously, though, put your dick away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sorry. You're right, I'm sorry. Please don't judge me. It's morning, it's also unseasonably cold in here. That's why it's so small. Don't judge me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So newsflash: the fog is bad. We probably need a new hideout.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We probably gave away our location.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope, no, we killed them all.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He just rolled a die.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should probably get the fuck out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What time is it, midnight?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now it's a little after midnight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we have not had a full rest?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's have a full rest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They don't know where we are yet. We killed everybody.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What if they have some sort of psychic communication, and what if this is their spawning ground? What if the Sun Tree is their spawning ground?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do some sort of check to see if the Sun Tree is their spawning ground?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make an intelligence check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just a straight intelligence check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. That's a natural one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay. Hey, that's what I rolled when I was trying to check things out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's hard to say. You don't understand a lot of the nature of undead; it's not your forte and things have been weird around here. You have no idea.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here's what we're going to do. I've got one silver piece right here. I'm going to flip it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait. Did you grow that mustache for tonight?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's awesome.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was a goatee a scant five hours ago. Now it is an Errol Flynn mustache. Thank you. We'll discuss it at break. I'm going to flip this coin because that's all we fucking got. If it's a 20, we're gonna stay here. If it's a one, we're going to find another place.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure, fuck it. Leave it up to chance.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We find another place.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can we tunnel our way to the tree?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's tunnel. I don't want to go up. No, we can't tunnel

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can't. I blew all my natural energies doing that Sunbeam.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's still night, though. We've had a short rest. We've got to get out of here. They know we're here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's night. We can't travel at night.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're a badass.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's vampires.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we step outside, it's game on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As opposed to down here in the hole?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like we're safer down here. At least there's only so many places they can attack from.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But the coin said we should go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's fine. When you went down that cavern that one time, that worked out really well. So let's do what she says.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, are you talking about when Vex and I came back with Clarota and he helped us for quite a while? Is that what you're talking about?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That worked out really well because we probably wouldn't have defeated K'Varn without him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, you're right, Vax. Vex, let's stay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's very open to interpretation.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Until he betrayed us and tried to eat Scanlan's brain.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm agreeing with the women because I want to live to see the morning.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I still think Clarota was a pretty good guy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We decide to stay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We stay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're stupid.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No we're not. We'll be fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if we went up above ground and went into the second floor? So we're not underground.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, sure, let's do that. That's no good, either.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are there two stories? I technically used my Hallucinatory Terrain spell to make it look like a one-story tavern.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What about this? How about we don't sleep in the tunnel? We barricade that up and we just sleep in the cellar. Not the tunnel, the cellar.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, let's do it. It's fine, whatever.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Back and to the left.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can we barricade the cellar somehow?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That I can do. I'll do a Wall of Stone where I tunneled.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're very packed in. It's nice and cozy and warm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is, and you're surrounded by a number of bottles of wine--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And bear farts.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And all the wine we stole. We stole a lot of wine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we pop open a bottle of that wine?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And try and relax?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we can. I guess I'll allow it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pop open the wine, share a bottle, and you all manage to find your way back to sleep. Who's taking watch now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll go with Vax because I haven't been yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you two take the next watch.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I stay awake because I don't want them to be alone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckles) All right, the three of you take this watch.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Half-elves, what what.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I go back to sleep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Half-elves, what what.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hello, my half-elven brothers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, a few hours of awkward conversation--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (shushing noises) Jeralt is speaking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sigil.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I haven't played that game, but is your name Solid Snake?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will attack both of you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cue internet rage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Oh man. All right, so after you guys take your watch, with seeming no incident, although some awkward conversation and a few jabs here and there. Final watch, who's taking that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've already watched.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I need to sleep. You need to sleep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck it, I'll do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Grog is up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket stays awake with you, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Trinket does like staying awake with you, Grog. You both understand each other on a very feral and unintelligent level.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Claws catching every once in a while.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually, everyone's managed to gather your evening's rest. You come to consciousness, the cold morning greets you. No seeming further incident in the cellar during the evening.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're welcome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would like everyone to make a wisdom saving throw, please.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No problem.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wisdom saving or just wisdom?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Saving throw? Oh right, because we've been in a cursed land for a while.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does my thing help me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your thing help you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have some thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The cube?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jack-of-all-trades?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, shit. I'll find it. Don't worry, come back to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is this? Wisdom?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Keyleth?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MARISHA, LAURA
lines.text: Oh, not Percy!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh god, look at that smirk on his face!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fuck you, Matt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you all come to consciousness, I would like you to put another point of corruption on your sheet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, how many can you get before you're totally evil?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What does that mean? Now what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tell you in a second.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Am I still coughing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys didn't get much of a meal the evening before, and you're all still a little sore after your evening's rest. You've pushed through and recovered from your exhaustion from your frenzied rage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ring of Mind-Shielding, is what I was going to say.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That mustache is getting very iffy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know what you're talking about.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we want some dried food rations?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus, there's probably dried food in this cellar.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have a ton in the bag.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we do a check to see if there's any jerky or anything in the cellar? Did we already do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys looked through. You found some jerky, some dried food that's serviceable. Not the best, but serviceable. All right. Going forward, the sadistic tendencies that you've been exerting through a lot of this event are becoming harder and harder to control. Be mindful that when you strike to kill, you strike to torture before you do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whoa, that's so cool. I mean terrible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is he the only one that was affected this time, again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. Everyone else rolled above a ten.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have a very low wisdom, and I rolled really badly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so. You finish your meal. Looking outside, what little bit of the windows you can see, since you covered them all with cloth, there's a little bit of daylight peeking through. It's soft daylight. It looks like, while it's not raining, there is still a cloud-covered sky. What is your plan of action?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have a question. My 11 points of permanently lowered hit points from the necrotic damage, can that be healed with a potion of greater healing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Those hit points have all come back, by the way, guys. Over the night, the hit points you lost on your hit point total have been returned.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I didn't suffer from this, but permanently lowered health?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, from the bite? That recovers after a long rest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Literally what I just asked.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What about the hit points that were lowered?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Literally what I just asked.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What? Don't-- My brain doesn't work-- (laughs) It's hot in here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we going to find another house to kill now? I mean, to carefully investigate and thoroughly due diligence the heads before we smash them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scanlan, I think you and I going to go see how people are feeling in the town while everybody else looks for a new hidey-hole, yeah?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we tunneling through this entire city?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think you are, but if it's first thing in the morning, I don't think the Briarwoods could have gotten to everybody yet, so I think you and I could do our father-son act for like an hour.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you just say fart the son act?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fart the son and the vampires, they're done-- father and son.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, father and son. Oh! Seeming!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because you're little, and I'm tall.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why don't we Seem all of us so we can go take a look around while you talk to--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we've got to find a different spot.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Quickly, though, because even though we don't look like ourselves, they know that there are strangers in town.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog, give everybody a little bit of the Dust of Tracelessness.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And we have the earpieces.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we? Do you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have one now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. So I am to Seem us as peasants again?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Same peasants, yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Different-looking peasants.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sings) Seeming. Feel me, touch me, heal me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sorry, folks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, so we're all peasants.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gnome bard wizard over here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm a cute little boy with a lazy eye. To match my grandma.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have the Hat of Disguise on underneath, just so even if it drops, I'm still not me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, good to know. All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So are we breaking up? Are you two going to scout the town and the rest of us will--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're going to talk to a few people, right, kiddo?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The rest of us are finding a new hideout?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we're looking for a new hideout.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where should we meet?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We've got the earrings.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've got the earrings, so once we find a place, we'll let you know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We'll come to you, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Check in every 30 minutes. It's dangerous.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I like that plan.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's the safety word?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'd leave that up to Percy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was going to say I'd leave that up to you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Meet back here in two hours--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Too long.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hold on. Meet back here in two hours if we haven't heard from everything.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If everything goes wrong, we meet back here in two hours. Otherwise, check in every 30 minutes. Do we need a code word?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, we need a code word.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Doritos.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was thinking Dorito, too! How weird.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Married.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dorito. I like that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so, as you guys press out into the day's sun, we'll take a quick break. We'll be back here in five minutes to continue this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hot. I might have to de-armor.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm taking this wig off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [break]

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Cthulhu might be thrown in there. We're still working out the details, but we're going to kick off Halloween. It's going to be pretty rad. And the chat room bought those figures for us, so we're going to play with them, and it's going to be awesome. And then after that, we have a really awesome band tomorrow night, and they're going to be coming in costume, and then we've got the game Nightmare on VHS.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, yeah! I used to have that, man.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Yeah. We're going to be rocking out Nightmare tomorrow night, and Felicia's probably going to be stopping by, and Ryon Day. We're going to have a big old Halloween party with Rock Band and everything else. So you guys are more than welcome to join us and celebrate Halloween.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You should be Baron Samedi for that one.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Baron Samedi?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's one of the characters you can play in that. God, that thing was so awful. It's going to be so great.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: It's so bad-good. I cannot wait.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whose turn is it? You. You are banished. Oh, that guy was so good.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: I can't wait, guys, so tune in for that. And for all the people last week that voted for me to have sideburns and a Freddie Mercury mustache, I have kept both all week, and tomorrow I will not have to anymore, so thank you for that. I love you guys. You're great. Good times, good job. That's all I have to say.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Their stuff is awesome. So thank you, Tor. I think that's it. So if everyone's back here, let's go ahead and-- oh, there he is. I was waiting for Burt to return.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I didn't want to disturb your announcements.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sit down, you dickless wonder.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, it's a sleeping monkey.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Easy, Helga. You meant nothing to me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) Oh?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Still so little expression on that face.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know what you're saying. I can perform perfectly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've moved on from Scanlan, and I've cut my hair as a sign of change.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like Vasquez.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I like it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, Aliens. Such a badass, Vasquez.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've taken my scarf off because it's really hot. It's really hot in here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You ever been mistaken for a man? Come on, you've got to know the response to that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, have you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Laura.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You got it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And Vex has advantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (explosion noise)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Down. (laughs) I will Quen all over your ass. I got Aard signs all day, yo. All right, anyway. So. What are the groups? You guys are splitting up across the city?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, right. Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that a thing? Are we doing this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is the dumbest idea, by the way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, it's the best.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Daddy Daycare. You and I, we're going to go talk to people.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Papa, let's go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keyleth, you and me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, the four of us are sticking together, I thought.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. And Trinket.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Trinket the donkey.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll go to the Alcove.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're going to the Alcove.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good. So.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What was the name of the guy that Grog de-tongued and kicked out the window?

lines.name: SAM, TRAVIS
lines.text: Kerrion.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was Vox.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He was shot in the face by Percy. This was Vouk.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Got it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thanks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So Vouk is alive?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I'm sure he told everybody what we looked like. We can't look like the same Seeming that we were before.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He can only tell them what we look like if he's a very clever artist.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but he can write it down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's really good at charades.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But they already know what we look like.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should've broken his fingers, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seeming.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought we dropped Seeming, though?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We didn't.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Would I have been smart enough to Seem us slightly differently?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Based on this conversation happening now? No. You have already transformed everybody into the original--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Except I gave myself a lazy eye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Except you have a lazy eye, which is different.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't think it makes a difference. I think there's no new people in this town.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: True. Even newer people might be suspicious.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Recognize us, I dare you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have crazy eyes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you do. Crazy old woman eyes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're like (growls).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just like that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But you guys are tunneling around, looking for new digs, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, we're walking around.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, that's up to them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's up to you. I thought-- who cares what I thought?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Indeed. So you and Scanlan continue off into the city.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I cast Pass Without a Trace on them before they leave. On all of us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right. There is a radius to it, I believe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, there is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They have to stay within a certain area of you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I really should read about spells more.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I can just look it up right here. I would do that, yeah. I would recommend looking up your spells.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, within 30 feet of me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What part of town is the Alcove?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Alcove would be on the northwest side of it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Gavroche, come on! And I swat him as hard as I can in the back of the head.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thenardier is our precious father.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do also see, as you head on your way out, there is still a slight bit of smoke slowly swimming up from the house in the distance, and what minor embers were not put out by the rainfall, it's just a little trace of smoke.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Was it the north, the east, or the west manor?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was the eastern.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Eastern manor.

lines.name: MATT
