lines.text: Now, when you get there, it's a relatively plain-looking building. Dark woods. There's a sign out front that says The Alcove. It's old. The metal that holds the sign has rusted a bit. The doors are open, and as you push into the building, it's largely empty and seemingly unkempt, compared to the previous oddity shops you've been to. Many books about enchantment look left out on one of the nearby tables, partially read and abandoned as if they were being flipped through. And then as you look across the room, behind the counter, there's a young girl in her late teens, a blonde waif of a girl, who's currently thumbing through a book and notices you guys enter. "Oh! Hi. Can I help you?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, we're looking to buy a few things, and we were wondering-- actually, I used to do business with Simon. Is Simon around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Simon was called away for a special project by the Briarwoods about six months ago. He told me "to look over the store while he's gone. I'm sorry, we're mostly out of stock. We don't have much here "at the moment."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He was called away on a special project? What sort of special project?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know. He lives in the castle now. I mean, he would visit every week or so, but he "hasn't been back in almost a month, and I'm a little worried."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He lives at the castle?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He lives at the castle? Oh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did he ever tell you about any details of this special assignment?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, unfortunately. He was the real enchanter here. I'm just trying to do my best to "learn what I can while he's gone."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Simon's daughter. Now, did he like the Briarwoods?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She gives you a look and looks about the room for a moment. "The Briarwoods have been very "fair and just rulers of this land."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm trying to look straight at her, but I'm really looking that direction and over there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's gathered as much and is seemingly offput by the whole presentation. "The Briarwoods "are just and fair, and we should not speak ill of them in public."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can somebody see if there's something watching?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, can I do a perception check around the room and see if there's any indications that the Briarwoods might have--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Monitoring?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, a bug? Like some sort of something where they might be monitoring this place.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A small electronic device.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes. That kind of bug.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not bad. 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking around the room, there doesn't appear to be any specific devices installed, whether magical or otherwise, that would pertain to immediate--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No blue poo. Got it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) Lean in, girl. Lean in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What can I help you with? We don't have much." And she reaches down and pulls out a couple of small glass vials. Simple healing potions, you can already see. You've worked with these type of things before.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're actually looking for something a bit more complicated and a little more dangerous.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She pulls up a small metal rod. "One of these?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know what that is. Let me show you. And I'm going to walk over to the wall, find a dusty wall, and I'm going to trace the symbol on the wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. She gives you a look and says, "It's dangerous to draw that around here, sir."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to wipe it away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She gets a little more comfortable as soon as you do. "What are you doing here?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're hoping that we could purchase a brief amount of sanctuary.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Here? Why?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We need to keep moving so that they don't catch us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The Briarwoods are after you? I can't have you here! You'll bring them right to me!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're after everybody. What we need is a place to stay that we know is protected.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (growls) Eight is-- 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, big number. It's a very large die.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I try and pour on top of it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say no. Not at this point. You're the one that originally spurred her worry. She gives you a look. "Look, if I'm going to let you stay here, I need to know more about what it is that "you're trying to accomplish here. Raising the symbol of the de Rolos? I've never seen any of you "in the city before in my life."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you miss the de Rolos, dear?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Anything's better than this misery."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, we may know a couple de Rolos. We may know some. No big deal.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's true.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She shakes her head and, "Foolish minds. The de Rolos have been dead for five years."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not all of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Really?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can't drop the Seeming, can I?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughing) No, you're stuck.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just drop that phat name of yours, buddy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Only one person would know the entire name of Percival de Rolo.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Miss, do you know the full name of Percival de Rolo?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was wondering if you were about to do it. Can you do it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it's Museldorf Musketeers--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Percival Sanchez Vicario--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: de Rolo III.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The Nina, the Pinta, the Santa Maria.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percival Von Musel Von Lichtenstein de Rolo III.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kevin Dorff, Wesley Snipes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Magneto de Rolo III.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: de Rolo III.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just talking about names.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Simon Whisk was a good friend to Percival Fredrickstein Von Musel Klossowski de Rolo III.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Percival Fredrickstein Von Musel Klossowski de Rolo III.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percival Fredricks Von Stein--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can call him Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Percival lives, and he's coming.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And one you're not sure the nature of, and says, "Take these." And she pushes them ahead to you. "It's not much." Two regular healing potions, one greater healing potion. She explains what the metal thing is. She picks it up and clicks part of the metal cusp of it, and it stays in the air on its own.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god! It's another Rod of Holding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Immovable Rod, but yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Combining them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's a movable rod?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Two greater healing and then another regular?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One greater healing and two regular.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's like a ladder rung that you can put wherever you want and hang on it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did we already have one of those?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we did.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What happened to it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tiberius put it somewhere, and it never came back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He put it on the magic carpet?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He might have. Tiberius had one. We didn't use it much.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's a mysterious motherfucker.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. She pushes it all towards you guys and says, "I have practically no one, and I "can't be much help. I'm not a fighter."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll take the rod.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will make sure that you are compensated when this is over. Can we sleep here for the night?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Follow me." She leads you to the back, and there's this very, very small room that looks like it used to be her father's room. It's dusty. Most of it has been untouched, except for the bed. She walks in. "This is all I have to offer. It's not much, but it's available."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it safe at night?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "As safe as anything is here. Just don't go outside."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What does the ceiling look like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about nine feet up. Maybe about two feet of rafters. Very simple. Very plain.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Remember when we were in the branches?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I insight check her and see if she seems to be truthful?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I never know which one. It's too much pressure to choose. That was the wrong one. I chose poorly. 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It's hard to tell. She's young, and she seems definitely earnest and plain with her forthrightness. Yeah, there doesn't appear to be any sort of deception.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We are allies. With us comes change. Keep our secret and all the better we'll be for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's kept, but I recommend talking to Keeper Yennen if you haven't. He's one of the "social centerpieces of the remaining good folk in the city."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have spoken to him. We will speak to him again today.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His reach is far. He'd be the one to talk to. Well, don't stay here long. That will draw attention.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Also, we're going to have two more staying with us, if that's okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: One's a child, though. You won't even notice him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Her shoulders slump a little bit. She's like, "All right. I'll prepare as best I can." And she starts reaching over and starts pulling these thin blankets out from a nearby cabinet and goes, "Well? Go!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good day. Everyone, let's meet over at the Lady's Chamber once you're finished with your business.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, now you guys.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm dragging you along by the scruff of the ear.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pa, please!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shut up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm tired.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to look for anybody walking by. Is there anyone nearby?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: After about a minute or so of walking, you do see what looks to be a young man carrying a satchel over his shoulder. It looks like it's filled with a few small pieces of parchment that are rolled up. He's in a brisk walk somewhere.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I walk right up to him and I awkwardly put a hand on his chest, and I make sure that I flip my pencil and spit as I talk and say, I need a hard drink. I need a hard drink right now. Where?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you're looking for a drink," And he points over down the road, and he's really put off by it and is trying to keep his face out of your breath. "You're going to look for the Journey's "End. Two blocks down that way, to the right. It's not much business during the day."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on, you shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (yelps) Call Child Protective Services!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you walk away, you hear him mutter under his breath, "What's this world coming to?" And he continues on his brusque pace.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm following his directions and going there. Journey's End, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's pretty barren. You walk inside. There are two employees. One who is behind the bar and is currently reading through a book. The second is currently pouring a drink for the one patron that's in there, what looks to be a slovenly looking gentleman who's sitting at a table drinking his woes away. He's currently going through what looks like a ledger of some kind, and there's a tavern employee with an apron on. He's this younger, red-headed boy, who's trying to fill a flagon while this gentleman at the table is cursing at him to the side. Other than that, it's empty.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Empty. So how many in here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Three. All right, I pull Jimmy-John after me, and sit down next to one of them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My name is Tad.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shut up! Your mother's going to kill us both. (sighs) Two! Two here, and a water for him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. Okay, I'll be right back," and he walks off, looking a little confused.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll have one of what he's having, as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckles) "That's cute. Water it is." And he's walking off.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I swat him in the back of the head for the bartender to see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glances sidelong towards you and says, "What the "fuck are you doing coming and bothering a man in the middle of his meal?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can't earn a living!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's nothing but misery."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Something's got to change here. I can't live. I can't give them what they want. I can't feed him. What are we fucking supposed to do here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I haven't eaten in three days.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's the worst fucking part, is you know there's always an easy exit."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What, you think the folks who've taken their life to this point? You think that's the "end, but no, not in this town. No, they just get right back up the next day. There is no way out."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The fuck are you talking about?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Talking about the whole business. There is no escaping this misery. Either you try and stay "alive and exist in this bullshit, or you die and become one of them. I've been trying to find a way "out of this city for months now, but they're always watching."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I take a huge drink of the mug in front of me. (sighs) Someone should run these fuckers out of town.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That ain't going to happen, mate. Sorry."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He says there's rebels afoot!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I take the mug that I have, and I pour the rest of it out on this little one's head and say, you speak when you're spoken to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, it's okay. Let the boy speak. Let your boy speak! What were you saying?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I'm just saying what I overheard. My friend Kevin, he's truthful. When he lies, his papa beats him, so I believe him. He said that someone really strong took out someone who was at that big fancy house that was all aflame the other day. He said that there's lots of them, and that they're going to free us all from this hell we live in!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughing) Man, that's a layered check. Make a persuasion and a deception roll, back to back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, two rolls?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was that good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How?! Is that even possible?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Deception, 15. Wait, or 29. It's a lot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your bonus?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, it's 16 plus 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so 29.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's 29. Sorry. It's a lot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gives you a stern look. "Huh. Well, it'd be nice, for a change, that there'd be someone up to fucking fight for this shithole of a place."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I start fake-weeping into my cup.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes, "Oh no. No need for that. Going to make me lose my appetite. Hate the sound of a "grown man crying. Chin up!" And he takes and flicks a coin at your face.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ow, fuck!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Look, if what he's saying's true, and we've got some sort of savior making their way into "town, well. Let's hope they're at least a little more prepared than the last ones."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The last ones?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The uprising three years ago. Are you new to this fucking town?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Three years ago, Papa wouldn't let me out of the closet, so I didn't hear much of what was going on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay, first and foremost, you've got to treat your boy better. Going to raise someone no "better than the motherfuckers running Whitestone right now if you keep this up."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (retches)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you really puke, or did you fake puke?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I think Mama doesn't love him anymore. I'm sorry. We can go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I think you should. But one thing: if he ever does anything else to hurt you again, you "come tell someone. Two: if you hear anything else about this savior coming into town, go ahead and "talk to Trevor over there, at the edge of the bar." And you see over there, there's the guy who's behind the bar with his book. He doesn't even notice all this happening. Guy in his mid-thirties, glasses at the end of his nose, his hair's slicked back and pulled into a taut ponytail, and he's sitting there reading. And he says, "Go ahead and tell Trevor, because the rest "of us would like to go out in a blaze of glory than live in this bullshit."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What was your name, sir?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not important to much, but you can call me Patrick."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you, Patrick. I don't know if my papa has enough money for these drinks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to insight check Patrick.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: From the floor?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's listening in. Go for it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, that's not that great. That's a 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He seems honest. Seems he's got not much to lose and his interest is piqued, but he's not wholly invested in this whole idea. But it's definitely caught his attention. "Well, let's get "him up." Stands up, reaches over and grabs you by the arm, lifts you up onto the stool on the side of the table and says, "Up, you." Pats you on the back. "You need to sober up, drink the water you "got for your boy, there, and get your ass out of here."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Walked out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He gives you a keen glance and nods slowly as you walk away. Looks over at the bartender for a second, and, "Psst! Trevor!" And then you exit the building. All right, you guys all convene at the Lady's Chamber. The other day, there were a few folks walking through the courtyard. Today, there's a group of about 25 people, all different dress, from what would be considered a Whitestone middle class, the few there are, to a number of other peasantry, farmhands, and other folk that look destitute by nature of existence here. All gathered in the amphitheater, and what appears to be a relatively hushed sermon or discussion currently going on by Keeper Yennen.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's not make ourselves known. I want to see this. I want to hear what's up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sit in the back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now, the information is still vague, but just keep "your eyes open. Be careful, be quiet. As things progress, word will find you." Bows his head and says a prayer that-- none of you speak Celestial?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You do?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I speak Celestial.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. The essence of the prayer is: By the guidance of the Lady, may civilization flourish and those that keep progression at bay be squashed beneath our feet. At which point the sermon breaks, and people begin to walk away and scatter.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to watch people as they walk away and try to read their lips as they're walking away to see if everybody seems loyal to what he said, or if anybody seems a little--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone is silent. Everyone is quiet, and everyone is looking warily and making their own separate paced exits, so as not to draw attention.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we try to memorize their faces? Of everybody that was here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You keep as best a mental image of everyone who's passing by. Not too many notable folk. They look like, especially where you're from, the peasantry doesn't really interest you visually, but you do manage to gather details of certain scars here and there, and people, hair color, age, stuff like that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did we recognize the guy that was talking?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that was Keeper.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keeper Yennen.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Any familiar faces in the audience?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, Scanlan, you and Keyleth both recognize some of the farmers. You guys have all gathered.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, we gathered again. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You recognize two of the individuals at this were the farmers you initially saw on the outskirts of Whitestone when you did your little scouting mission earlier.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, nice. When we flew in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So from all the people you've encountered, those are the only two that you specifically recognize so far, but it does appear to be made up of--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Working hands, farmers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, the foundation of this city that have been so long oppressed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I elbow Percy, and I go, do we talk to him?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we do. Maybe he talks to us. I try and catch his attention.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You can see as he begins putting out some of the incense, he looks over and sees, "Ah, "yes. You've returned. Please, follow me." And he steps outside of the amphitheater and around the back of it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We follow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I am to believe that these allies you spoke of "previously were responsible for this dastardly attack on Sir Kerrion?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That could be inferred.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I have spoken privately with a number of the remaining community leaders of our town, "and they are unconvinced. Understand, this isn't the first time an insurrection has been attempted, "and much sorrow was endured after previous failures. We keep hope best we can, but without a "solid plan, we are sending the rest of our able-bodied into the abyss."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What happened last time?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, in a similar fashion, we had a number of fed-up individuals decide to finally raise some "sort of aggressive act against the castle and attempt to storm it by force. We figured we had "the numbers. There are many dangers in that castle that go beyond what we were prepared for. As such, "the few that survived, well. They met the fate most do at the Sun Tree these days. So we've been "remiss to put ourselves in a similar position for many years now. To make matters worse, our "informant within the castle has gone silent these past few weeks. We have no idea of the progression "of the Briarwoods' plot."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Was your informant by chance named Simon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No. Simon has been missing for some time, actually."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who was your informant?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know the name. The information comes through-- actually, he should be arriving "here in just a moment."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What did they find underneath Whitestone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All that we know is they've been rebuilding or repurposing something old and terrible beneath "the city. I've only heard whispers of it referred to as the ziggurat."

lines.name: LAURA, TRAVIS, MARISHA
lines.text: The ziggurat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (creak) And another enters the room. A very elderly man steps in, his ragged robes draped on his very thin, frail form.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wink at him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's nearly hairless on his head and has liver spots all over his scalp. One of his eyes is clouded over and white. He shimmies in very slowly. "I ask you strangers, what makes you so sure you can change the tide of this battle?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (whispers) Drop Seeming. Drop it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I recognize this person?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As old as he may be, there is a subtle power and resonance and confidence to his voice. There's a force of personality and conviction that immediately leads you to believe that this man is or once was a man of great power and respect.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are there windows in the room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are two windows. They are currently shut with curtains.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You should show him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You, Percy, recognize this man. He was once the chancellor to your father, and a long-respected philosopher in Whitestone known as Archibald Desnae.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Archibald Desnitt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Desnae. He was very well-respected. Very stern, and crotchety at times, but very much aided your family in holding the city together in times of strife.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I pull out Sir Kerrion's notebook and I hand it to them and I say, this should be some proof that we mean what we say.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Reaches out, and his long, spindly fingers wrap around the tome, pull it towards him. "So you "bring a trinket. That is helpful. But to kill one mortal man is no feat compared to the darkness "that lies in that castle. You need more than that."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I remove my hat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I drop it on one of us, or do I have to drop it on all of us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say you can drop it on an individual, if you prefer.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. I will drop Percy's Seeming.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. There's a slamming sound as the tome he's holding hits the floor.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hello, Archie.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Percival? Sweet Percival."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not so sweet these days. I did not think you would have lived.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I thought you had perished in the subjugation. Percival, you have no idea the joy "this brings to my heart." And he reaches out and touches the edge of your face like he's still in disbelief. "Your hair. It seems age has caught up to you, as well."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was difficult, leaving.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see a smile creep across his very tense old-man face, and he looks about the room with a renewed energy that wasn't there before.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My friends are strong.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "With you here, Percival, we've two de Rolos spearheading the rebellion. We have the guiding "light the people need."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who else survived?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Your sister lives, Percival."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Guide us, Vox Machina."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait. You know who we are? How does he know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't think that we haven't heard of your "exploits. Help us bring a dawn back to this land."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I may have a plan. How fares Professor Anders?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Professor Anders has been lost to us since before the insurrection. He is a man taken by what "promises the Briarwoods have given him. What little he has shown his face in this town, he is "not the man he once was, or at least the man we thought he was was never "who he truly claimed to be."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He lives in the house in the east? House in the north?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He lives in the castle with the Briarwoods, as well."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Lady Ripley lives in one of those mansions.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "She did. There have been reports in recent days that she's been quick to pack. We know not "where she resides now."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who lives in the third house?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Here." And he takes a moment to think of which house you're referring to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We burned one of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, you did. The house is Kerrion's house, and then there are two other homesteads of the new "nobles, one of which is currently held by the Duke," he says with disdain. "Goran Vedmeyer."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Goran Quagmire?

lines.name: LAURA, SAM
lines.text: Vedmeyer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Vedmeyer. He has supposedly been put in watch at the temple of Pelor, but he's left that "to ruin. The other home houses Count Tylieri, a rather sadistic man who oversees the timber "production of Whitestone."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The what production?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Timber."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that the house that the Countess was briefly residing in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Briefly."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Count Tygieri?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Tylieri."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tylieri. How are these men, the duke and the count? What do the people think of them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The Briarwoods, when they took Whitestone, did not take it alone. They came to this land with "a small army of cutthroats, mercenaries, sell-swords they brought over from whichever "forsaken land they came from. Each one of those men that then proved to be of utmost use to them "in that rebellion, they were given titles and nobility and homesteads. They were given "responsibilities over the land, the people beneath them. I can only assume that was part of their "payment for their service."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But they're just thugs who were particularly successful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "As far as I know, yes."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are they supernatural? Are they undead?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not to my knowledge."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If we were to continue working our way up this totem pole, which of the two is less powerful?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Which of the two is reviled most?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, what would start an uprising?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Count Tylieri is known for being quite the sadistic individual. Beating, torturing his "servants, sometimes publicly to show his hand to those who would cross him. He would definitely be "a message to send, if there were one."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have a plan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've got one, too. Kill him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, that's part of the plan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So the choice is yours."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We act now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Act now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Against the Briarwoods?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Count Tylieri.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Here's my plan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you recall, your captive back at Greyskull Keep was previously the owner of the driver of the Briarwoods, Desmond. The one that beat him senseless until eventually Lord Briarwood saw this and then took him as his own driver.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm just a small boy, but we've seen mists at night, strange things that come out when the sun goes down. Are those focused around a central area of town, or are those everywhere?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The mists are a means of intimidation. It's merely a magical precursor to the undead minions "of the Briarwoods. They slink through those mists, use them as cover. If you see it, run."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We heard about green fog here. Is that something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "In the castle, yes. There are vents in what was once the garden. I know not the nature of "these vents or what is being utilized to produce this foul, noxious odor, but it has put a scent on "the city for many years."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we know what killed the tree?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We know not."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And in your time, do you know anything about Lady Delilah? What she is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The few times she's walked the city, it's been procession and power. She seems to enjoy the "attention. She's a vain one, that one."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who's this?

lines.name: LAURA, TRAVIS
lines.text: Lady Delilah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does she come out during the day?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "She walks in the sun, unlike her husband."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Unlike her husband?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think she's a vampire.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She may not be a vampire.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think she's a bitch.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What do you think of a distraction?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What kind of distraction?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What if there was a way to start a ruckus at the Vedmeyer estate? Start a fire, maybe. Start a ruckus of some kind.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Vedmeyer estate?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The third house.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The duke's. Okay, yes?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're going to be waiting and expecting us, so if they think we're attacking one of the houses and then instead we attack the other while everyone's rushing to deal with what they think is the next attack, we attack the second home, and then when they prepare for us to attack the third home, that's when we attack the castle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, you want to go bam-bam-bam?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Today, it's just one. We've already dropped one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The next attack will be on the Briarwoods.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, he's saying create a distraction.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We make a big stink in the house we're not going into.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That I'm cool with. Percy, how much do you want people to see the de Rolo family crest? How much do you want people to know of your presence here? Do you want a big proclamation? Because I might have that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Will it put my sister in danger?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's hard to say."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Perhaps keep her, just to surprise me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That symbol is not the de Rolo family seal, is it? It's modified.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a part of it. Definitely. I want them to know. They need to know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's a tough decision. The symbol does carry the weight of the people and does carry a "beacon of hope. But it, as you said, may put your sister in danger. It's hard to say. The choice is "yours in how you wish to use it."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We used to do it as kids for fun, but it might be perfect in this circumstance.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I did it a little in college. It's fun.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dual-wielding. I can Skywrite for you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How do you mean?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like a giant sparkler.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like a what?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In the future, they came up with these awesome things called--

lines.name: SAM, MATT, TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Skywrite with clouds?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, skywriting with clouds.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You control the clouds?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can you actually write letters in them?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's crazy talk.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you clear out clouds? Then if you can do that, can you make these gray clouds go away?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we want the gray clouds to go away?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, sunlight would be nice as opposed to this misty fog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a good point.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe temporarily.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, controlling weather on that scope is a little beyond your grasp. You can alter elements of it and you could darken elements of the cloud to form a message or a symbol if you would like, but actually removing the clouds, that would be--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you poke a hole in them?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Temporarily, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll remember that. Let's go pick a fight with a house!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: From a distance. We pick a fight with a house from a distance so we can get to the other house and pick a fight there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there just one of us who can make a big stink in the decoy house?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can probably make a big stink.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You could definitely make a big stink.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But you can catch up through one of those little doorways.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Please, it's big for me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How about this? I use one of my exploding arrows you gave me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, those are so cool. Save those for a person.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a good ranged stink.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've got Magic Missiles. I've got all sorts of shit. I can do Stinking Clouds, I can make them see things, I can blow open their doors. I can do it. You guys go have fun.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But you can also do this from a distance so we can get you far away. You could do both.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll start on the distraction.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I'm going to give you a second arrow as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The arrow?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a question-mark arrow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's an arrow?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks heavily tinkered. It's a little front-loaded with the weight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You know what it will do to the roof if it works?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, cool.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a kill-Trinket arrow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh man, you know what? I forgot I-- okay, cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Yes. What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just don't. I have thoughts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cool, have thoughts. Keep them going.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Arrow?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Arrow?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, can we do something now, please?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. Let's do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll head over to the other house. Show me on the map where it is so I know where I'm going.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What time is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: By this point in the day, it's probably around three in the afternoon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to do this now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: When do you want the symbol to go up?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, we may not need it yet. That may actually work out well once we've--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Lit the houses up?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Once it's up, can you actually write it in smoke coming off the house?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I think I could.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With a crack of thunder, rainfall begins to hit on the city.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why is it raining again?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because it's this fucking town. It's fucked. No offense. It won't be fucked soon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Your town sucks, weather-wise.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So the northern house or the western house?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The other is Count Tylieri."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So this is the mess and this is our actual?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm the mess?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're the mess.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're burning daylight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So probably from about here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going with Scanlan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, come with us, Keyleth!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If I've said it once, I've said it a hundred times. I don't need help.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I wasn't trying to help you. I was trying to write the de Rolo symbol in smoke. I don't really care about you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can do it from the other house. It's sight-based.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They need your magic.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's no knocks against you. He's going to catch up quickly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And if I die, tell Pike I love her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You won't die, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I might. I'm a little wee man.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, I'm going with them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're a little boy. We're making very reasonable plans with this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Did you put your hat back on?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have put my hat back on, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, yes, because you're very much visibly Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not anymore, I'm not!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually, you get to the outskirts of both abodes, and you can see the dark clouds in the sky, occasional claps of thunder and flashes of light. Even though it's midday, it's pretty dark right now. The few folks that are out and about have their heads covered with hoods, and they're trying to stay under overhangs to stay nice and as dry as they can. You are all soaked to the bone at this point, just pushing through. Your cough is still setting in pretty heavily at this point, too. You guys make your way to the outskirts of the home. You, Scanlan, skipping along, the boy that you are with your one weird wandering eye, find your way to the other abode. So. What's the plan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How far is the gate from the front door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about 25, 30 feet. And the house that you're looking at right now, it's very well-crafted. Looks like it's made from a lot of the fine timber of Whitestone, the lighter woods and dark woods contrast with each other, stained to show the variation in the two. It's a very beautiful home.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Any guards? Anything around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently, you can see there is one guard visible at the front. That's all you can see at the moment.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And if I walk around back, is there any guards around back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a second guard around back that is just now stepping out of an outhouse that is situated behind the building.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That would excite you. I don't know why.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. Because they haven't phoned me to tell me that we're ready to go, I will become a dragonfly and buzz into the dwelling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Meanwhile, the twins are looking at our home, sizing it up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Keeping a close eye. Through the dark rainy atmosphere, you can see on both homes, the interiors are slightly lit. There appears to be individuals at home in both homes. You just can't see who it is, necessarily. There is light in the interior. As you turn into a fly and make your way, this little boy just walks and (zip). Go ahead and make a stealth check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You turn into a fly and make your way through the bars and begin (buzzing) over the yard with your one-twentieth of a hit point in fly form. Make your way. Any of the nearby windows all seem to be shut. The front door is closed. There might be a gap, but the guard is standing in front of the door.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Again, they haven't phoned me, so I'll perch on the handrail or door frame or something just above him and wait.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. He takes notice of your buzzing as you go by and goes back to his watching. The rest of you guys?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're sizing up the other home.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Oh, how about this? Maybe we can tell Scanlan to set off the thingy. I'll come running out as my old crazy lady, saying, (screams) the house is under attack! Toward the guards guarding this house. And then I'll just stand there as they react.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I like it. Could we look at this house first?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought we did.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I thought you went to shoot the arrows in the other house.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, that's what Scanlan said.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do I see? I'm looking all over this house.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Abysmal-looking. Other than that, there's not much else to say on the building.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No guards, nobody watching?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not currently any guards outside of it, no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want to go for a circle around.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stealthy. Stealth. I cast Pass Without a Trace on him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) And you stay within 30 feet of him?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Huh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Can you stay within 30 feet of him?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess I stealth behind him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Both of you guys roll stealth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no. Which one should I use?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Add ten.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jeez!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's pretty good. What did you add? Oh, because of Pass Without a Trace! Oh, 38.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go, 36 and 38, boom.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're both discovered and killed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Immediately. Just like that. You push into one of the nearby alleyways, curve around the side, and make your way to the back portion of this. And the gate is buttressed up against one of the surrounding buildings-- it's a warehouse of some kind-- to the point where there's a little bit of space you can get over, but it's about eight feet up and it is a spiky top, but looking over, you do see there is one guard that is slowly patrolling around the outside, and you see through the nearby window what looks like two humanoids that just crossed paths at the front of the window.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Two humanoids are in the house, there's a guard between the home, and the warehouse thing you just described?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. Basically, you didn't see it from your perspective. Once you went around the alleyway to the other side of it, you do see there is one guard that is slowly patrolling the outside.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) I can perch and take him out with an arrow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You do your thing, yeah. Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want to sneak-attack him? That might be smarter.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll start, you follow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Got it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we let Scanlan do his thing first and then we sneak attack him? Set it all in motion?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All at the same time, then. On the count of three.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What are we doing? Wait, what?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's going on?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scanlan, whatever you're going to do, I want you to get ready to do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then we'll count to three and we'll attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shouldn't I do mine first?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, you do. Tell us when.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, you want me to do mine first?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Whenever you're ready.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How about wait 30 seconds and go?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Got it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to say, roll an intelligence check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on, Burt.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Intelligence?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With advantage, because you're a bard. Just add your intelligence modifier.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He gave you advantage. Roll again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I already get advantage for intelligence checks. 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Through your bardic research and hearing many tales and seeing scribblings in books of presumably madmen, apparently, that there were certain creatures that existed long before the civilization had taken root. You have heard of some of these, one of which is the mighty and frightening triceratops. You hear it's just a fable, but it's fun to pretend to be one, sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Three horns and big.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. And out of nowhere, this tiny fly (boosh) into a triceratops. (boom) Lands, crushing the man beneath you. He's going to attempt to-- oh, rolled a 20 on his saving throw. So he's only going to take half damage. Go ahead and roll 3d6 crushing damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17? Whoa, okay. He did not like that. Okay, he is crushed and he is prone beneath you right now, (groans).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And for my move, I bash down the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Go ahead and roll an attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, yeah. Go ahead and roll another 3d6.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Three, six, that wasn't anything. Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wood chunks go flying everywhere with a large roar. You see part of the inside of the foyer collapses from that side of the building. You basically take out a whole support and start thrashing around. You hear voices begin yelling out from in the household, and immediately five guards start rushing in from different rooms towards you. All right. Two of which are holding already armed and ready crossbows. We'll get to that in just a second.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to run up behind the one guard and beat him in the back of the head with the back of my dagger.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and roll an attack. He does not see you; this is considered a surprise attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ooh, that's not that good. So that's 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That hits, all right. And then the second attack, which'll also have advantage, is 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23 also hits, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Or no, 25 for the first attack--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sneak attack?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. It's a surprise round. Don't you get double damage for being an assassin?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like I do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that's all you needed. He had 45 hit points. (whack) With one hit to the back of his head, he crumples onto the ground, smacking into the wet grass around this field.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I look over my sister's shoulder and say, Grog! You want to play? Come on, you want to play?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Grog always wants to play!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Go for the door!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck it. I rage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're just going straight into the house?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What are we doing? We're watching all this happen? We're all like, oh, there goes Grog.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, because you've said nothing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys right now watch as now Vax runs over and tells Grog to run in and go after the front door.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, that's not what I said. I said, do you want to play?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I took off running.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog is running toward the door now. You guys see him bolt off, burst through the gate.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Activate the flaming warhammer.

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: I guess we're going.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everybody's running at the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so go ahead and roll a strength check just for the hell of it. There is a closed gate. Athletics, this would be.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is currently closed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We saw front door, we saw some sort of warehouse, and a side window with two people going, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's flank.

lines.name: LAURA, LIAM
lines.text: Let's go in the window.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll meet you in the middle!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we go in the window.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You said there was a door around back?

lines.name: MATT, LIAM
lines.text: There's windows around back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll go around back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll also go around back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, but that's only Grog in the front now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I give him Trinket. Going in with you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You want to send him in with me? It's going to be nasty where I'm going. It's all-day buffet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's going in the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can we see any of the damage? Is there any smoke rising from the house yet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's nothing sending smoke at that point.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm trying to get a better look and listen as I run closer to the windows.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (yelling)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But I'm a dinosaur!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm waiting for smoke.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, and we'll see how this plays out next week, because right now if we keep where this is going, this could be-- we could be here until late, and I need to get out of this costume.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Still a dinosaur. Open the door.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Scanlan on the floor. Everybody flee; there's a dinosaur.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Triceratops. Damn it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn it. (laughs)

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: So I have a couple requests from the community. One of which is that every single one of you post a full-body picture of your costume and post it to Twitter so they can get a good look without being blocked by the table. I think everyone just really wants to see his legs because he's not wearing pants under that dress.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But he is wearing a little petticoat.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: And the other request was for you to explain how in the hell you made this, because this is amazing. They want a really quick run-down of what you did here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Well, for the armor pieces, the base is Sintra, which is one-eighth of an inch thick PVC sheeting. You can buy it at sign supply stores.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (snores)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And this is a pleather that I stitched together and then adhered across it to make the trim, and that's how I made the armor.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Would you be willing to come on Mines N Crafts and do a little more detailed show-through of it? Because it's really cool, and there's details you guys can't see. Everyone was like, let him show off his swords, and I'm like, they're not real swords.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nah, you can pull them out.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Yeah, you want to show them off?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. I can't really grab them from here.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: That's very ineffective for battle, Matt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So less dexterous than the video game.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can't put claymores on your back, which is a big fallacy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, unfortunately I don't have the lack of clipping that an actual warrior would have in this armor. Trust me, it's a sword.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here's a little secret for people who love video games: when the heroes pull out a gun, put a gun away, pull out a sword, put a sword away, there's a guy on the performance capture set who just catches it and walks away. Hands it into your hand, so all this, they just go (pfft) and they don't put it anywhere. They just let go of it.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Actually, I posted that video today on twitter that one of the Critters posted and I retweeted it of Laura and Travis doing their motion-capture for Halo 5. Which guys, you should definitely check out Halo 5. Travis and Laura are both in the game.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We meant to announce that, yeah. It just released this week.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Yeah, it just released this week and Travis did some of the mocap for Fred and for Nathan Fillion's character, and in the video it shows you guys basically just throwing down--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Some magic item.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: It's pretty cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So great. Yeah, and Minecraft released this week.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Story Mode!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Story Mode, yeah.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Yeah, we showed a little bit of that. It was like, oop, that's Matt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there anybody else in Story Mode of Minecraft that we should mention?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That are friends of ours? I mean, Cat Taber's in it--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ashley fricking Johnson!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. I thought I mentioned it previously, but yeah.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Just assume if a game's coming out, one of these guys--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't escape us.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: You can't escape. It gets really weird now every time we turn on a game and we're like, and who is this this week?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Now you know our pain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry about that, guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ruins every game.

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA
lines.text: Sorry not sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We heard your voice at Target.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We were walking through Target and were like, "Hey, guys."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh right, yeah, the Playmation toys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You started talking at us--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys have seen the cool Marvel Playmation toys for kids, the imaginary stuff. I do Iron Man and Loki and a few other guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. I'm going to go play with mine. Yeah, anyway.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Well, we had some donations today for Extra Life. This was our last week for Extra Life donations, guys. As a whole, okay, we'll get through these and then I'll read the total overall, because it's something everyone in our community should be proud of.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: [end of transcription]
